医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调大麻的使用与青少年的心理健康风险有关《流行病学》的评论研究了澳大利亚和美国年轻人使用大麻对心理健康的负面影响，揭示了抑郁、焦虑、自杀、精神病和大麻使用障碍的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-highlights-cannabis-use-linked-to-mental-health-risks-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-highlights-cannabis-use-linked-to-mental-health-risks-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca8a087d-9860-47f9-8e49-f316ae763060 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 18:25:00 -0400 Study highlights cannabis use linked to mental health risks in youth
研究表明日常食物环境暴露会影响快餐习惯研究调查了日常接触各种食物环境对饮食选择的影响，重点关注快餐店的光顾，并揭示了日常活动中接近快餐会显着影响消费模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-reveals-daily-food-environment-exposure-shapes-fast-food-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-reveals-daily-food-environment-exposure-shapes-fast-food-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3aa5f35-26f5-4caa-9b28-bab974a3994a Mon, 18 Mar 2024 18:01:00 -0400 Study reveals daily food environment exposure shapes fast food habits
研究表明异质耐药性如何成为抗生素耐药性的先兆一项新的研究表明，异质耐药性（一种在许多细菌中常见的短暂耐药性）如何成为抗生素耐药性发展的先兆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-shows-how-heteroresistance-can-act-as-a-precursor-to-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-shows-how-heteroresistance-can-act-as-a-precursor-to-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=573277ea-4695-43be-9bba-2ce4cdd03482 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:59:22 -0400 Study shows how heteroresistance can act as a precursor to antibiotic resistance
研究表明，减肥后卡利司他汀表达增加减肥后，超重和肥胖的人在皮下白色脂肪组织中表达更多的卡利他汀*蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Kallistatin-express-increases-after-weight-loss-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Kallistatin-expression-increases-after-weight-loss-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ad27a8b-5d5e-4f14-a59d-1aab203c95d5 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:52:00 -0400 Kallistatin expression increases after weight loss, study reveals
Hope for PDCD 和 Cure Mito 基金会推出联合患者登记处Cure Mito 基金会和 Hope for PDCD 基金会这两个以患者为主导的基金会，分别致力于推进研究和支持受 Leigh 综合征和丙酮酸脱氢酶复合物缺乏症 (PDCD) 影响的家庭，它们很高兴地宣布启动 PDCD 患者登记处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Hope-for-PDCD-and-Cure-Mito-Foundation-unveil-joint-病人-registry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Hope-for-PDCD-and-Cure-Mito-Foundation-unveil-joint-病人-registry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ca50a8d-b385-4a08-9b54-1c3998b90d83 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:48:46 -0400 Hope for PDCD and Cure Mito Foundation unveil joint patient registry
研究揭示了与超罕见综合征相关的基因突变的内部运作渥太华大学医学院的一个团队完成了一项令人兴奋的新研究，揭示了基因突变的内部运作机制，这种突变导致了一种极其罕见的综合症，自 20 世纪 60 年代初首次描述以来，报告的病例还不到 100 例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-reveals-the-inner-workings-of-gene-mutations-linked-to-ultra-rare-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-reveals-the-inner-workings-of-gene-mutations-linked-to-ultra-rare-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=277ecb73-ae85-4eeb-82c9-38377249f9ba Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:43:43 -0400 Study reveals the inner workings of gene mutations linked to ultra-rare syndrome
新的液体生物标志物有一天可能会在症状出现之前检测到 ALS 和 FTD肌萎缩侧索硬化症（ALS，俗称卢伽雷氏病）和额颞叶痴呆（FTD，最近演员布鲁斯·威利斯和脱口秀主持人温迪·威廉姆斯的诊断结果出现在新闻中）这两种渐进性退行性疾病的联系不仅仅是事实它们都会损害对正常功能至关重要的神经细胞——；前者影响大脑和脊髓的神经，导致运动能力丧失，后者则侵蚀控制个性、行为和语言的大脑区域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/New-fluid-biomarker-may-one-day-detect-ALS-and-FTD-before-symptoms-appear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/New-fluid-biomarker-may-one-day-detect-ALS-and-FTD-before-symptoms-appear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e0dc37d-8c2d-498c-aa22-984e97f5c9c3 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:39:17 -0400 New fluid biomarker may one day detect ALS and FTD before symptoms appear
小鼠模型揭示了怀孕期间使用二甲双胍对后代的影响随着妊娠期糖尿病和代谢紊乱的增加，二甲双胍的使用也越来越频繁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Mouse-models-shed-light-on-the-effects-of-metformin-use-during-pregnancy-on-offspring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Mouse-models-shed-light-on-the-effects-of-metformin-use-during-pregnancy-on-offspring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b91dffd-9df5-4a24-a59b-c4e63ab218d2 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:34:10 -0400 Mouse models shed light on the effects of metformin use during pregnancy on offspring
研究人员发现与冠心病相关的新型蛋白质生物标志物冠心病是一个主要的全球健康问题，特别是对于 2 型糖尿病患者来说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Researchers-identify-novel- Protein-biomarkers-linked-to-coronary-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Researchers-identify-novel- Protein-biomarkers-linked-to-coronary-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a49b568-f935-4f89-8f15-c66b53b7a68b Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:17:07 -0400 Researchers identify novel protein biomarkers linked to coronary heart disease
怀孕期间使用抗精神病药物与儿童神经发育障碍或学习困难无关悉尼新南威尔士大学领导的研究表明，怀孕期间使用抗精神病药物与儿童神经发育障碍或学习困难无关，这为那些担心在怀孕期间继续服用药物的人提供了保证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Antipsychotic-use-during-pregnancy-not-linked-to-childhood-neurodevelopmental-disorders-or-learning-difficulties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Antipsychotic-use-during-pregnancy-not-linked-to-childhood-neurodevelopmental-disorders-or-learning-difficulties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf6e0ac6-eed0-4498-94ad-91fe1b73a079 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:13:20 -0400 Antipsychotic use during pregnancy not linked to childhood neurodevelopmental disorders or learning difficulties
